data.title: Flyers, Penguins rivalry: From Lou Angotti to Harry Zolnierczyk, here's list of 73 who played for both
authors: Randy Miller | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
data.meta_description: Steve Downie is latest to switch sides in Flyers/Penguins rivalry.
data.text:
PITTSBURGH - John LeClair had three 50-goal seasons playing on the Flyers' Legion of Doom line and finished his career as a Pittsburgh Penguin.

Hall of Fame defenseman Paul Coffey had some great seasons in Pittsburgh, then later suited up for the Flyers.

Future Hall of Famer Mark Recchi posted 100-point seasons for both teams.

There's been a lot of that since the Flyers and Penguins became NHL expansion teams in 1967-68.

The Flyers and Penguins built a great rivalry that often is heated, yet 73 players have suited up for both teams. That's 12.7 percent of the 573 players who have played at least one game for the Flyers,

The latest to switch allegiances is enforcer Steve Downie, who was with the Flyers last season and now is a Penguin.

Downie will face the Flyers as a Penguin for the first time on Wednesday night. Also on the Pittsburgh bench will be new assistant coach Rick Tocchet, who was an All-Star right wing as a Flyer and Penguin.

"You play for the jersey on you," Downie said. "I forgot about Philly."

Here's a list of the 73 players who have played for both the Flyers and Penguins:

1. Lou Angotti (Flyers 1967-68; Penguins 1968-69).

2. Shawn Antoski (Flyers 1994-95 to 1995-96; Penguins 1996-97)

3. Arron Asham (Flyers 2008-09 to 2009-10; Penguins 2010-11 to 2011-12).

4. Nolan Baumgarter (Pittsburgh 2003-04, Flyers 2006-07)

5. Len Barrie (Flyers 1989-90 to 1992-93, Penguins 1994-95 to 1995-96)

6. Harvey Bennett (Penguins 1974-75 to 1975-76; Flyers 1976-77 to 1977-78).

7. Josef Beranek (Flyers 1992-93 to 1994-95; Penguins 1996-97; 1999-00 to 2000-01).

8. Tom Bladen (Flyers 1972-73 to 1976-77; Penguins 1978-79 to 1979-80).

9. Andy Brinkley (Flyers 1982-83; Penguins 1983-84 to 1984-85).

10. Mike Bullard (Penguins 1980-81 to 1986-87; Flyers 1988-89 to 1989-90).

11. Jeff Chychrun (Flyers 1986-87 to 1990-91; Penguins 1990-91 to 1992-93).

12. Paul Coffey (Penguins 1987-88 to 1991-92; Flyer 1996-97 to 1998-99).

13. Alexandre Daigle (Flyers 1997-98 to 1998-99; Penguins 2002-03).

14. Steve Downie (Flyers 2007-08 to 2008-09; 2013-14); Penguins 2013-14)

15. Mark Eaton (Flyers 1999-2000; Penguins 2006-07 to 2009-10; 2012-13).

16. Darryl Edestrand (Flyers 1969-70; Penguins 1971-72 to 1973-74).

17. Pat Falloon (Flyers 1995-96 to 1997-98; Penguins 1999-2000)

18. Ruslan Fedotenko (Flyers 2000-01 to 2001-02, 2012-13; Penguins 2008-09 to 2009-10).

19. Ron Flockhart (Flyers 1980-81 to 1983-84; Penguins 1983-84 to 1984-85).

20. Hal Gill (Penguins 2007-08 to 2008-09) Flyers 2013-14)

21. Nate Guerin (Flyers 2006-07 to 2008-09; Penguins 2009-10).

22. Adam Hall (Penguins 2007-08; Flyers 2012-13 to 2013-14).

23. Greg Hawgood (Flyers 1992-93 to 1993-94; Penguins 1993-94 to 1994-95).

24. Wayne Hicks (Flyers 1967-68; Penguins 1967-68).

25. Gary Inness (Penguins 1973-74 to 1975-76; Flyers 1975-76 to 1976-77).

26. Jaromir Jagr (Penguins 1990-91 to 2000-01; Flyers 2011-12).

27. Chris Joseph (Penguins 1987-88, 1994-95 to 1995-96; Flyers 1998-99)

28. Orest Kindrachuk (Flyers 1972-73 to 1977-78; Penguins 1978-79 to 1980-81).

29. Mitch Lamoureux (Penguins 1983-84 to 1984-85; Flyers 1987-88).

30. John LeClair (Flyers 1994-95 to 2003-04; Penguins 2005-06 to 2006-07)

31. Guillaume Lefebvre (Flyers 2001-02 to 2002-03; Penguins 2002-03 to 2005-06)

32. Ross Lonsberry (Flyers 1971-72 to 1977-78; Penguins 1978-79 to 1980-81)

33. Rick MacLeish (Flyers 1970-71 to 1980-81, 1983-84); Penguins 1981-82 to 1982-93)

34. Kent Manderville (Flyers 1999-00 to 2001-02; Penguins 2001-02 to 2002-03).

35. Frantisek Kucera (Flyers 1996-97; Penguins 2000-01)

36. Moe Mantha (Penguins 1994-85 to 1997-88; Flyers 1988-89 & 1991-92)

37. Kevin McCarthy (Flyers 1997-78 to 1978-79, 1985-86 to 1986-87; Penguins 1983-84 to 1984-85).

38. Eric Meloche (Penguins 2001-02 to 2003-04; Flyers 2006-07).

39. Dave Michayluk (1981-82 to 1982-83; Penguins 1991-92).

40. Lew Morrison (Flyers 1969-70 to 1971-72; Penguins 1974-75 to 1977-78).

41. Carl Mokosak (Flyers 1985-86; Penguins 1986-87).

42. Glenn Mulvenna (Penguins 1991-92, Flyers 1992-93)

43. Petr Nedved (Penguins 1995-96 to 1996-97; Flyers 2005-06 to 2006-07).

44. Simon Nolet (Flyers 1967-68 to 1973-74; Penguins 1975-76).

45. Richard Park (1994-95 to 1996-97 & 2011-12; Flyers 1998-99).

46. Alexandre Picard (Flyers 2005-06 to 2007-08; Penguins 2011-12).

47. Dan Quinn (Penguins 1986-87 to 1989-90, 1996-97; Flyers 1991-92, 1995-96).

48. Mark Recchi (Penguins 1988-89 to 1991-92, 2005-06; 2006-07 to 2007-08; Flyers 1991-92 to 1994-95, 1998 to 2003-04).

49. Gordie Roberts (Flyers 1997-88; Penguins 1990-91 to 1991-92).

50. Randy Robitaille (Penguins 2001-02 to 2002-03; Flyers 2006-07)

51. Kjell Samuelsson (Flyers 1986-87 to 1989-90, 1995-96 to 1997-98; Penguins 1991-92 to 1994-95).

52. Ulf Samuelsson (Penguins 1990-91 to 1994-95; Flyers 1999-00).

53. Dave Schultz (Flyers 1971-72 to 1975-76; Penguins 1977-78 to 1978-79).

54. John Sim (Penguins 2003-04; Flyers 2005-06)

55. John Slaney (Penguins 1999-2000; Flyers 2003-04).

56. Garth Snow (Flyers 1995-96 to 1987-98; Penguins 2000-01).

57. Kevin Stevens (Penguins 1987-88 to 1994-95, 2000-01 to 2001-02; Flyers 2000-01).

58. Art Stratton (Penguins 1967-68; Flyers 1967-68)

59. Rich Sutter (Penguins 1982-83 to 1983-84; Flyers 1984-85 to 1985-86)

60. George Swarbrick (Penguins 1968-69 to 1970-71; Flyers 1970-71).

61. Max Talbot (Penguins 2005-06 to 2010-11; Flyers 2011-12 to 2013-14).

62. Bobby Taylor (Flyers 1971-72 to 1974-75; Penguins 1975-76)

63. Mark Taylor (Flyers 1981-82 to 1983-84; Penguins 1983-84 to 1984-85)

64. Billy Tibbetts (Penguins 2000-01 to 2001-02; Flyers (2001-02).

65. Dave Tippett (Penguins 1992-93; Flyers 1993-94).

66. Rich Tocchet (Flyers 1984-85 to 1991-92, 1999-00 to 2001-02; Penguins 1991-92 to 1993-94)

67. Tim Tookey (Penguins 1983-84; Flyers 1986-87).

68. Dunc Wilson (Flyers 1969-70; Penguins 1976-77 to 1977-78).

69. Ken Wregget (Flyers 1988-89 to 1991-92; Penguins 1991-92 to 1997-98).

70. Ed Van Impe (Flyers 1967-68 to 1975-76; Penguins 1975-76 to 1976-77).

71. Wendell Young (Flyers 1987-88; Penguins 1988-89 to 1991-92, 1994-95).

72. Zarley Zalapski (Penguins 1987-88 to 1990-91; Flyers 1999-00)

73. Harry Zolniercyzk (Flyers 2011-12 to 2012-13; Penguins 2013-14)
